DATE.description: The date for the data entry.

ADVERTISER_ID.description: The unique identifier of the advertiser.

AD_ACCOUNT_ID.description: The unique identifier of the advertising account.

AD_ID.description: The unique identifier of the ad.

AD_GROUP_ENTITY_STATUS.description: The status of the ad group entity.

AD_GROUP_ID.description: The unique identifier of the ad group.

CAMPAIGN_DAILY_SPEND_CAP.description: The daily spend cap set for the campaign.

CAMPAIGN_ENTITY_STATUS.description: The status of the campaign entity.

CAMPAIGN_ID.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

CAMPAIGN_LIFETIME_SPEND_CAP.description: The lifetime spend cap set for the campaign.

CHECKOUT_ROAS.description: Return on ad spend for checkout actions.

CLICKTHROUGH_1_GROSS.description: Gross click-throughs for a specific action 1.

CPC_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: Cost per click in micro dollars.

CPM_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: Cost per mille in micro dollars.

CTR_2.description: Click-through rate for a specific action 2.

ECPCV_IN_DOLLAR.description: Effective cost per click for view actions in dollars.

ECPCV_P95_IN_DOLLAR.description: Effective cost per click for view actions at the 95th percentile in dollars.

ECPC_IN_DOLLAR.description: Effective cost per click in dollars.

ECPC_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: Effective cost per click in micro dollars.

ECPE_IN_DOLLAR.description: Effective cost per engagement in dollars.

ECPM_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: Effective cost per mille in micro dollars.

ECPV_IN_DOLLAR.description: Effective cost per view in dollars.

IDEA_PIN_PRODUCT_TAG_VISIT_1.description: Product tag visits for a specific action 1.

IDEA_PIN_PRODUCT_TAG_VISIT_2.description: Product tag visits for a specific action 2.

IMPRESSION_1_GROSS.description: Gross impressions for a specific action 1.

OUTBOUND_CLICK_1.description: Outbound clicks for a specific action 1.

OUTBOUND_CLICK_2.description: Outbound clicks for a specific action 2.

PAGE_VISIT_ROAS.description: Return on ad spend for page visit actions.

PIN_ID.description: The unique identifier of the pin.

PIN_PROMOTION_ID.description: The promotion ID of the pin.

TOTAL_SIGNUP_VALUE_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: Total sign-up value in micro dollars.

TOTAL_VIDEO_3SEC_VIEWS.description: Total video views for at least 3 seconds.

TOTAL_VIEW_ADD_TO_CART.description: Total views leading to add to cart actions.

TOTAL_VIEW_SIGNUP_VALUE_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: Total view sign-up value in micro dollars.
